about:
I’m a passionate Full-Stack Developer, with a B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering from Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College (2024). I specialize in building powerful web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), and I’m skilled in crafting sleek, responsive interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.


I love solving coding challenges, working with APIs, and creating real-time systems like my News Alert App. A quick learner and a tech enthusiast, I’m always excited to tackle new projects and push my skills to the next level.


Let’s connect and build something amazing together!
